thread.title: Giants say WR Odell Beckham Jr. makes trip to Philadelphia
thread.title_full: Giants say WR Odell Beckham Jr. makes trip to Philadelphia - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Giants say WR Odell Beckham Jr. makes trip to Philadelphia
text:
Robert Sabo/New York Daily News Odell Beckham hopes to play on Monday night vs. Eagles despite not practicing this week. Odell Beckham Jr. may be on track to play on Monday night against the Eagles in Philadelphia.
The receiver, who injured his hamstring last Sunday against the San Francisco 49ers, made the trip to Philly on Sunday, the Giants announced. Beckham did not practice at all last week, although he still hoped to play on Monday.
VACCHIANO: SAME OLD INJURY PROBLEMS HAUNT GIANTS ONCE AGAIN
FOLLOW THE DAILY NEWS SPORTS ON FACEBOOK. "LIKE" US HERE.
The only Giants who did not travel were WR Victor Cruz (calf/knee), CB Prince Amukamara (pectoral) and LB Devon Kennard (Hamstring). With little depth at corner, the Giants signed CB Brandon McGee from the practice squad and waived tight end Jerome Cunningham.
Related Stories JPP to report back to Giants, have hand re-examined: sources The night Victor Cruz was injured still haunting Giants Tags: odell beckham jr.
